title: ProLink2
subtitle: Your Ultimate Digital Profile Builder.00
description: Create, manage, and share a stunning, professional bio link page that brings all your content together.

features.title: Stunning Customization
features.description: Choose from multiple themes, animated backgrounds, and custom colors to make your profile truly yours.

features.title: Advanced Controls
features.description: Manage unlimited links, generate custom slugs, and get suggestions for your profile fields with our AI assistant.

features.title: Dynamic QR Codes
features.description: Create and customize QR codes with your logo and brand colors to bridge the physical and digital worlds.

features.title: Bilingual Support
features.description: Full support for English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL) to reach a wider audience effortlessly.
